H0.text: Which composer did pianist Clara Wieck marry in 1840. Franz Liszt

H1.text: Which composer did pianist Clara Wieck marry in 1840. Johannes Brahms

H2.text: Which composer did pianist Clara Wieck marry in 1840. Frédéric Chopin

H3.text: Which composer did pianist Clara Wieck marry in 1840. Robert Schumann

A4.text: Schumann and Clara finally married on 12 September 1840, the day before her twenty-first birthday.

A5.text: Clara gave birth to a daughter in September 1841, the first of the Schumanns' seven children to survive.
